WheelHistory Class Reference

#include <WheelHistory.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class for storing a time history of wheel states.

Member Function Documentation

void WheelHistory::AppendHistory (  const ssfTime &  _appendTime,
const Vector &  _appendAngVel,
const Vector &  _appendTorque
) 
 

Add the wheel's angular velocity and torque, which occured with an ssfTime object, to the history.

Appends the state at t=_appendTime. if the new state occured at a time that is earlier than any of the stored values then the time history will be erased from the overlap point and the new state will be appended.

Parameters:
_appendTime the ssfTime object specifying when the state occured.
_appendAngVel the new Angular Velocity (3-elements) vector to be appended [rad/s].
_appendTorque Torque vector (3-elements) to be appended [N-m].

Definition at line 52 of file WheelHistory.cpp.

void WheelHistory::AppendHistory (  const double &  _appendTime,
const Vector &  _appendAngVel,
const Vector &  _appendTorque
) 
 

Add the wheel's angular velocity and torque, which occured at a time in seconds, to the history.

Appends the state at t=_appendTime. if the new state occured at a time that is earlier than any of the stored values then the time history will be erased from the overlap point and the new state will be appended.

Parameters:
_appendTime time (in seconds) to be added.
_appendAngVel the new Angular Velocity (3-elements) vector to be appended [rad/s].
_appendTorque Torque vector (3-elements) to be appended [N-m].

Definition at line 37 of file WheelHistory.cpp.

Matrix WheelHistory::GetHistory (   ) 
 

Returns a matrix of the wheel's state history.

returns the matrix of the form: // Get a matrix of the stored state and output [t0, wheel angular velocity (rad/s), wheel torque (Nm) @ t=0] [t1, wheel angular velocity (rad/s), wheel torque (Nm) @ t=1] [t2, wheel angular velocity (rad/s), wheel torque (Nm) @ t=2] etc...

Returns:
This function returns an "Nx7" matrix of the state history, where N is the number of time states stored.

Definition at line 73 of file WheelHistory.cpp.

void WheelHistory::GetState (  const ssfTime &  _requestedTime,
Vector &  _returnAngVel,
Vector &  _returnTorque
) 
 

Returns the wheel's state at the requested time.

May require interpolation (see Interpolator).

Parameters:
_requestedTime requested state time. If it is not an integrated mesh point, interpolation will be used to determine the approximated value. The _requestedTime may be different due to errors (outside state bounds, uncalculable interpolation).
_returnAngVel the angular velocity vector at the requested time.
_returnTorque the 3-element torque vector at the requested time.
